#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[101][101],b[8];
vector<int> goa,gob;
int sa(int u,vector<int> p){
    sort(p.begin(),p.end());
    int ret = 1e7,v;
    if(!p.size()) return 0;
    do{
        v = a[u][p[0]];
        for(int i = 1;i < p.size(); ++i)
            v += a[p[i - 1]][p[i]];
        ret = min(v,ret);
    }while(next_permutation(p.begin(),p.end()));
    return ret;
}
int main(){

    cin.sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    for(int i = 0;i < 101; ++i){
        for(int j = 0;j < 101; ++j)
            a[i][j] = 1e6;
        a[i][i] = 0;
    }
    int n,m,w,s,u,v;
    cin >> n >> m;
    while(m--){
        cin >> u >> v >> w;
        a[u][v] = w;
        a[v][u] = w;
    }
    for(int k = 0;k < n; ++k){
        for(int i = 0;i < n; ++i){
            for(int j = 0;j < n; ++j)
                if(a[i][j] > (a[i][k] + a[k][j]))
                    a[i][j] = a[i][k] + a[k][j];
        }
    }
    cin >> s;
    for(int i = 0;i < s; ++i)
        cin >> b[i];
    cin >> u >> v;
    int x = (1<<s);
    int ans = 1e7;
    for(int i = 0;i < x; ++i){
        for(int j = 0;j < s; ++j){
            if((1<<j)&i)
                goa.push_back(b[j]);
            else
                gob.push_back(b[j]);
        }
        ans = min(ans,(sa(u,goa)+sa(v,gob)));
        goa.clear();
        gob.clear();
    }
    cout << ans << "\n";
}
